reviewText: Wonderful!  Gorgeous music and visuals from beginning to end.  A fabulous production; it swept me away.  Highly recommend!
This is the best version of Puchini's opera Tosca that I have ever seen. Loved it.

Beautiful cinematography and great performances throughout.  I first checked this out from Netflix, watched it several times and then reluctantly returned it.  I couldn't get it out of my head and so, finally got a copy for myself so I could watch any time I wanted!!

This is a delicious, one-of-a-kind tour-de-force, a gift to the future from Puccini---who would doubtless have embraced the whole mad concept and thrown himself into its execution. And, hell: Storaro's the cinematographer! This Blu-Ray disc is also a gift to the future---from engineers who recorded it in high-def long before it was commercially available.
